headline: Zimmer Biomet’s total knee implant component gains FDA 510(k) clearance
summary: The implant is set to be available commercially in the US market by Q1 next year.

raw.headline: Zimmer Biomet’s total knee implant component gains FDA 510(k) clearance
raw.summary: The implant is set to be available commercially in the US market by Q1 next year.

headline: ZBH Stock Might Rise Following FDA Nod for Knee Implant Component
summary: Zimmer Biomet's Persona SoluTion Porous Plasma Spray Femur gets FDA 510(k) approval. The company expects to launch the system in the first quarter of 2025.

raw.headline: ZBH Stock Might Rise Following FDA Nod for Knee Implant Component
raw.summary: Zimmer Biomet's Persona SoluTion Porous Plasma Spray Femur gets FDA 510(k) approval. The company expects to launch the system in the first quarter of 2025.

headline: Zimmer announces FDA clearance of Persona SoluTion Porous Plasma Spray Femur
summary: Zimmer Biomet (ZBH) Holdings announced FDA clearance of Persona SoluTion Porous Plasma Spray Femur, a total knee implant component offering an alternative for patients with sensitivities to bone cement and/or metal. The Persona SoluTion PPS Femur features a porous coating for cementless fixation and leverages a proprietary surface treatment designed to enhance wear performance. Hypersensitivity to metal is a challenge for a certain patient population associated with a traditional cemented total
